answers.answer: What is "provostains"? When naming medication it is important to spell them correctly. If you meant provostatin, it is possible. We cannot read minds nor look over your shoulder, what is this "fluid pill"? Taking combinations of medications may have adverse effects on your glucose levels. If you provide us with complete and correct names of all medications you take we may be able to provide a suitable response.

question: does provostains raise blood sugars mine have been higher since i started it. also take a fluid pill and they say that raises your sugars too
